messages.message: thanks for the heads up Cody!

quick question - this covers the details of changes to the github branch management for classic releases. How would this change what we have in the release system? Based on what you described above, it does not look to be changing. Would be great to know the details on this.

Yes, for now we haven't planned to do any work around removing `release-system`, since the scope of that isn't very well known yet. Release bundles will be the same as they are today, and so the output from any given certification day should be the same as we expect today - it will just all be built by a single job run instead of one per release version. :slightly_smiling_face:
yup Iâ€™ll make sure to integerate this there
